org.docgene.model

Class XMLReference

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docgene.model.XMLReference
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.docgene.model.ArticleReference, org.docgene.model.ParagraphArticleReference, ParagraphElement, StyledElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    XMLMoreInfo, XMLSeeAlso, XMLSeeAlsoHeading, XMLSeeArticle

    public class XMLReference
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.docgene.model.ParagraphArticleReference, StyledElement
    Represent an internal reference (to another article). The reference can link to the article itself, or to a chapter in the article.

    Interwiki References IDs

    Interwiki references to articles. can be:
    • The article ID: see XMLArticle.getID()
    • The article description: see XMLArticle.getDescription()
    • The article description where the white spaces have been replaced by underscore characters
    Additionnaly references to chapters can be:
    • The chapter title
    • The chapter title where the white spaces have been replaced by undersocre characters

    Examples

     <ref id="refID" desc="the description" />
    This links to the article which ID is "refID". 
     <ref id="refID#the chapter" desc="the description" />
    This links to the article which ID is "refID", and chapter with the title "the chapter".

        public java.lang.String getRefID()

        • Its description: see XMLArticle.getDescription()
        • Its description where the white spaces have been replaced by underscore characters
        • Its ID if it has an ID attribute: see XMLArticle.getID()
